title: sans serif modern typeface

comments.content:
[Maven Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416005521/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/maven-pro).  
There are [3 light weights](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416005521/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=maven) available as well.
